select bn.*,mi.NAME ,mi.NICKNAME, (SELECT COUNT(T.ID) FROM MY_TITLE T WHERE T.ID = MI.ID) AS WRITER_TITLE_CNT, MY.TITLE_INDEX, TL.TITLE_NAME AS WRITER_TITLE_NAME from board_normal bn, MEMBER_INFO mi LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT TITLE_INDEX, ID, CHOOSE_TITLE FROM MY_TITLE) MY ON mi.ID = MY.ID AND MY.CHOOSE_TITLE = 'Y' LEFT OUTER JOIN TITLE_LIST TL ON MY.TITLE_INDEX = TL.TITLE_IDX where bn.INSERT_ID = mi.ID AND BN_IDX = #{value}

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT a.*, ROWNUM as rnum FROM ( SELECT bn.*,mi.NICKNAME,mi.NAME ,(SELECT count(mt.CHOOSE_TITLE) FROM TITLE_LIST tl ,MY_TITLE mt WHERE tl.TITLE_IDX = mt.TI_IDX AND mt.ID = bn.INSERT_ID ) AS WRITER_TITLE_CNT ,(SELECT tl2.TITLE_NAME FROM TITLE_LIST tl2,MY_TITLE mt2 WHERE mt2.CHOOSE_TITLE = 'Y' AND tl2.TITLE_IDX = mt2.TITLE_INDEX AND mt2.id = bn.INSERT_ID )AS WRITER_TITLE_NAME from BOARD_NORMAL bn ,MEMBER_INFO mi where BN .INSERT_ID =mi.ID AND bn.kind = 'F' ORDER BY INSERT_DAY DESC)a) WHERE rnum >= (5*#{value})+1 and rnum <= (5*(#{value}+1))

select a.*from( select aa.*, rownum r from( select bc.*,mi.NICKNAME,mi.NAME, (SELECT tl.TITLE_NAME FROM TITLE_LIST tl ,MY_TITLE mt WHERE mt.ID = bc.INSERT_ID AND mt.CHOOSE_TITLE ='Y' AND tl.TITLE_IDX = mt.TITLE_INDEX) AS WRITER_TITLE_NAME , (SELECT count(mt2.CHOOSE_TITLE )FROM MY_TITLE mt2 WHERE mt2.id = bc.INSERT_ID ) AS WRITER_TITLE_CNT from BOARD_COMMENT bc,MEMBER_INFO mi WHERE bc.INSERT_ID =mi.ID AND bn_idx =#{bnIdx} order by INSERT_DAY DESC ) aa ) a where r >= (10*#{index})+1 and r <= (10*(#{index}+1))
